item.description:
Join us at The Point for a Christmas party meetup!

Feel free to dress up in your best holiday party duds or come as you are from work/school/etc. (There is no dress code.)

Whether you've been coming for years or can finally make it for the first time, come on out for some holiday cheer!
All are welcome!


PARKING TIP: The Point validates parking at the Parcel 7 garage: $1/hr for up to 3 hours.

Hope you can make it! Bring your friends!

**********

The monthly meetup is a casual gathering to give us lonely MA Republicans an opportunity to meet one another. The recent crowds have included a great mix of long-time members and first-time attendees!

Come whenever you can for a drink or dinner, or simply for the conversation. There's no agenda, so feel free to talk politics, current events, jobs, sports, vacation plans, movies...

**********

Don't be discouraged by the small number of RSVPs on this site; we usually have 30-35 attendees!


Note: This meetup event is cross-posted at the Boston (young) Republican Party Meetup Group and on Facebook.
item.name: Republican Christmas Party Meetup!
